name: Racing Car Infinite Path
description:
Racing Car Infinite Path is hard driving game on zigzag tracks and ramps roads. Vehicles are genuinely new and branded with crazy physics of simulation, braking, turning and driving. Crazy car drive at your full speed and you will complete the missions on time. If you are a very fast speed stunting car racer and have given the position for stunt car racing games, then you are ready to experience the real new stunt car rally in the mid of sky with no limits of speed. The fantastic and amazing car stunts will blow your mind.
Features:
- Easy to use car controls
- Awesome quality HD graphics
- Real engine sounds
- Dangerous environment for impossible stunts.
- Fabulous sound effects
- Impossible tracks.
